name: Screams of the Branded
text: If a Fusion Monster was sent to your GY this turn: Special Summon 1 of your Fusion Monsters that is banished or in your GY. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn to activate the effect of "Fallen of Albaz": You can Set this card. You can only use this effect of "Stigmatika Scream" once per turn.
